FuncDef: This command enables BGP multipath for the IPv4 and IPv6 address families.
CLIs: multipath <max-paths> [ ebgp <ebgp-max-paths> ] [ ibgp <ibgp-max-paths> ] [ restrict { same-neighbor-as | exact-as-path } ]

ParaDef.Info: The maximum number of multipaths per prefix/NLRI if ebgp-max-paths or ibgp-max-paths does not apply. Values-1 to 64.
The maximum number of multipaths per prefix/NLRI when the best path is an EBGP-learned route. Values-1 to 64.
The maximum number of multipaths per prefix/NLRI when the best path is an IBGP-learned route. Values-1 to 64.
The non-best path must have the same neighbor AS in its AS path as the best path.
The non-best path must have the exact same AS path as the best path.
